mission: Marvel Comics: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, cigarette glowing with power! Speech bubble: 'I'm the only MAN in the cabinet!' TRANSFORMATION: Cabinet members become kindergarteners! Action panels: YOM KIPPUR WAR! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in other! KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure panel - files scatter! TIME REWIND PANELS showing ignored warnings. Kitchen diplomacy: World leaders SHRINK in her presence! Resignation panel: Mushroom cloud of smoke. Final panel: 'There's no Palestine' - Internet EXPLODES in background! POW!

script_processing.original_script: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, her cigarette glowing with immense power. I am the only man in the cabinet! TRANSFORMATION! Cabinet members instantly become bewildered kindergarteners. YOM KIPPUR WAR! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in the other. KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure panels show scattered, ignored files. TIME REWIND! Warnings are seen being dismissed by a dismissive hand. Kitchen diplomacy. World leaders shrink, awestruck by her presence. Resignation! A mushroom cloud of smoke. There is no Palestine! Internet EXPLODES!
